resource: 1002770.description=The driverâ€™s seatbelt buzzer sounds to alert the driver that his or her seatbelt is not fastened. Once the engine switch is turned to IGNITION ON mode, the buzzer sounds for six seconds. If the vehicle reaches a speed of 12 mph (20 km/h), the buzzer sounds intermittently for ten seconds. If the front passenger's seat is occupied, the front passenger's seatbelt also needs to be fastened to make the warning light (warning buzzer) turn off. 1002770.derived=false 1002770.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002770.vtc=true
